description:
While attempting to beat the Krapen, Chup, Mayonna, Gobson, Béarnaise, and Pigsy try out a special axe jara. Could it be the perfect tool to chop off a stubborn Krapen limb? Will they be able to extract the precious resource – Kranel No. 2 Xtreme Moisturizing Cream – for the even-more-precious Princess Melonia? Chup and his friends will risk life and ten limbs for the cause!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nandemo Kiru Koto ga Dekiru Ken!?
なんでも斬ることができる剣!?
